channel.title: Comments on: Kuri Gives Thanks
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Joel! Kuri will work with Android smartphones. :)
item.content:encoded: Hi Joel! Kuri will work with Android smartphones. 🙂

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Michael - Fair point. We're sorry you're disappointed, and frankly, our team is too. We received a ton of enthusiasm for Kuri's pre-orders. That, combined with the difficulty of building home robots, led to a delay in some pre-order customers' shipments. We're really proud of the new features we've introduced on Kuri since CES 2017, and hope they add value to your home once your Kuri ships this spring. We appreciate you being a Kuri supporter and apologize for the delay.
item.content:encoded: Hi Michael – Fair point. We’re sorry you’re disappointed, and frankly, our team is too. We received a ton of enthusiasm for Kuri’s pre-orders. That, combined with the difficulty of building home robots, led to a delay in some pre-order customers’ shipments. We’re really proud of the new features we’ve introduced on Kuri since CES 2017, and hope they add value to your home once your Kuri ships this spring. We appreciate you being a Kuri supporter and apologize for the delay.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi there - We're happy to have you as part of Kuri's crew. Speaking of cat videos, did you know Kuri can purr? ;) https://vimeo.com/242864713
item.content:encoded: Hi there – We’re happy to have you as part of Kuri’s crew. Speaking of cat videos, did you know Kuri can purr? 😉 https://vimeo.com/242864713

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Kathryn - Thanks for following Kuri and supporting our vision! We really appreciate it.
item.content:encoded: Hi Kathryn – Thanks for following Kuri and supporting our vision! We really appreciate it.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Richard - No plans for modular add-ons as of yet. We're really proud of Kuri's hardware design and think Kuri's adorableness and functionalities will keep her from getting put in the closet after a year. ;)
item.content:encoded: Hi Richard – No plans for modular add-ons as of yet. We’re really proud of Kuri’s hardware design and think Kuri’s adorableness and functionalities will keep her from getting put in the closet after a year. 😉

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Colin - Great question! We're focusing on successfully shipping throughout the U.S. this year and will explore international shipping in the future. If you haven't already, please subscribe to our email newsletter to hear about international shipping updates first. Thanks! http://bit.ly/2y11dxS
item.content:encoded: Hi Colin – Great question! We’re focusing on successfully shipping throughout the U.S. this year and will explore international shipping in the future. If you haven’t already, please subscribe to our email newsletter to hear about international shipping updates first. Thanks! http://bit.ly/2y11dxS

item.title: By: Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael
item.description: I was super excited when I heard about Kuri introduction at the 2017 CES.... So much so I pre-ordered my Kuri on January 22, 2017. I thought I would for certain receive my very own Kuri in time for the holidays... But to my disappointment I received a email stating my pre order would not ship out until spring of 2018. I thought the whole point of pre ordering in advance is to make certain that you actually receive it in advance.
item.content:encoded: I was super excited when I heard about Kuri introduction at the 2017 CES…. So much so I pre-ordered my Kuri on January 22, 2017. I thought I would for certain receive my very own Kuri in time for the holidays… But to my disappointment I received a email stating my pre order would not ship out until spring of 2018. I thought the whole point of pre ordering in advance is to make certain that you actually receive it in advance.

item.title: By: pfon71361
item.dc:creator: pfon71361
item.description: I have my deposit down for a KURI and hope to acquire one in the near future. Meanwhile, I'll just have to watch KURI videos on YouTube along with those funny cats.
item.content:encoded: I have my deposit down for a KURI and hope to acquire one in the near future. Meanwhile, I’ll just have to watch KURI videos on YouTube along with those funny cats.

item.title: By: Colin Menzies
item.dc:creator: Colin Menzies
item.description: When is Kuri going to be made available for shipping to Australia?
item.content:encoded: When is Kuri going to be made available for shipping to Australia?
